title.en: Negative Hero and Demon King's General

altTitles.en: Negative Hero and the Demon Lord Army Leader
The Negative Hero and the Chief of the Demon Army
ネガティブ勇者と魔王軍幹部

description.en:
What happens when the hero arrives at the castle of the general of the demons and knows that they wouldn't be able to defeat it? She cries and is comforted by the general of demons himself!

Original manga by Hamachon 「ハマちょん」
(Link to Artist's [url=https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=136577]Pixiv[/url] | [url=https://twitter.com/hamatyonn]Twitter[/url])

Buy the physical volumes:
[url=https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=455318]MelonBooks[/url]
[url=https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/item/040030692701]Toranoana[/url]
[url=https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/ZHORO57583]Suruga-ya[/url] (compatible with most package forwarders)

[hr]Português:
[SPOILER]O que acontece quando uma heróina chega ao castelo do general do rei dos demônios e sabe que não conseguiria o derrotar? Ela chora e é consolada pelo próprio general do rei dos demônios![/SPOILER]

German:
[SPOILER]Was passiert, wenn der Held im Schloss des Generals der Dämonen ankommt und weiß, dass sie ihn nicht besiegen kann? Sie weint und wird vom General der Dämonen selbst getröstet![/SPOILER]
